page.title: 14Religions in Cupar
page.content: {The Church}is an important part of life in Cupar today. There are 5 {church buildings}in Cupar & 4 denominations. There is a Roman Catholic Church, a Baptist Church, a Scottish Episcopelian Church, & 2 Church of Scotland{churches.}Each {church}has various groups of its own_ such as Sunday Schools, Womens' Groups, Mens' Groups & Youth Groups. However there is a Youth Fellowship which is ecumenical, welcoming its members from any of the{churches}in Cupar. Another{religous group}in Cupar is the Jehovah's Witnesses who meet in the Castlehill Community Centre.
